resources.string: Welcome to Bookstagram! An app design for you who loves reading and wants a social place dedicated to exactly that. This app is a work in progress and will feature a verity of different stuff to do when complete. A few examples are: Find book recommendations and authors, journal your reading, add friends, join discussions and much more.
Sally Rooney (born 20 February 1991) is an Irish author and screenwriter. She has published three novels: Conversations with Friendsâ€¦, Normal People (2018), and ( Read more..)
